title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity 
Accounts) Emergency Measures and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 
(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electricity cost (domestic electricity accounts) emergency measure miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
heading: 2. The 18th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 32 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 October, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [520] 3
